properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 15 at 4:20AM EST until January 16 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...
YellowJacket Creek near Hogansville affecting Troup County

Line Creek near Senoia affecting Coweta...Fayette and Spalding
Counties

Flint River near Griffin Hwy. 16 affecting Fayette and Spalding
Counties

Ocmulgee River near Macon affecting Bibb...Houston...Jones...
Monroe and Twiggs Counties

Oconee River near Penfield affecting Clarke...Greene and Oconee
Counties

Little River near Washington affecting Taliaferro and Wilkes
Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Flint River near Griffin Hwy. 16.
* Until Thursday morning.
* At 4 AM Wednesday the stage was 13.9 feet...and
slowly falling.
* Minor flooding is occurring.
* Flood stage is 12 feet.
* The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by after
midnight tomorrow.
* At 14 feet...Minor flooding expands into the woodlands...fields
and pasture upstream and downstream from the gage on Georgia
Highway 16 or Newnan Road. The backyards of homes at the end of
Landing Way upstream from the bridge will be flooded with around
one foot of water.
* This crest compares to a previous crest of 13.3 feet on Dec 30 2018.
